Question
 34 
 
A theodolite was set up at a station P. The angle of depression to a vane 2 m above the foot of a staff held 
at another station Q was
0
45
 . The horizontal distance between stations P and Q is 20 m. The staff reading 
at a benchmark S of RL 433.050 m is 2.905 m. Neglecting the errors due to curvature  and refraction, the 
RL of the station Q (in m), is 
 
(A) 
413.050 
(B) 413.955 
(C) 435.955 
(D) 431.050 
 
(B)

Question
 36  
 
Crops are  grown  in a  field  having  soil, which  has  field  capacity of 30% and  permanent  wilting point 
of 13%. The effective depth of root zone is 80 cm. Irrigation water is supplied when the average soil
moisture drops to 20%. Consider density of the soil as 
3
1500kg/m
  and density of water as
3
1000 kg/m
 .  If
the daily consumptive use of water for the crops is 2 mm, the frequency of irrigating the crops (in days), 
is  
 
(A) 
11 
(B) 13 
(C) 10 
(D) 7 
 
(* 60)

GATE 2020 
 [Afternoon Session]
 
Civil Engineering
PAGE
12
